markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Doll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1332)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 58

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Dolls are found throughout Golarion in a wide variety of forms. Among the most common are miniature painted figurines, plush animals crafted from fur and stuffed with cotton, porcelain dolls with fine clothing and silky hair, fabric hand puppets, and elaborate marionettes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 0"
pfs="Standard"
>
Doll
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 58

**Price** 1 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This price is for an average doll of any type.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>
Exquisite Surprise Doll
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 58

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Hiding an object inside this beautifully crafted surprise doll grants you a +1 item bonus on [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks made to [Conceal an Item](/Actions.aspx?ID=61), as the compartment is particularly well-hidden and weighted to ensure the doll doesn't feel off-balance with an item inside.
